Related topics

Table of contents

    Commands ======== help ---- help Shows general help.

    help [command] Shows help about commands.

    edit ---- edit [site] Auto rebuild on save, and start development server. edit [site] --output /www/project Use custom output directory.

    build ----- build [site] Build site. build Build all sites in stado directory. build [site] --output /www/project Use custom output directory.

    watch ----- watch [site] Rebuild site on save. watch Watch all sites in stado directory and rebuild on save. watch --output /www Use custom output directory.
